## TagFrames.Image type

`APIC` (attached picture) tag frames

Filename or image data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Image = string | Buffer | {
    mime: string;
    type: {
        id: number;
        name?: string;
    };
    description?: string;
    imageBuffer: Buffer;
};
```
